snippet: Second-seeded Garbiñe Muguruza improved to 2-0 in group-stage matches at the WTA Finals by beating Angelique Kerber, 6-4, 6-4, in Singapore.
abstract: Garbine Muguruza beats Angelique Kerber at WTA Finals in Singapore.
lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Garbiñe Muguruza improved to 2-0 in group-stage matches at the WTA Finals by beating Angelique Kerber, 6-4, 6-4, in Singapore.
